page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Virtually everyone in this area is engaged in agriculture, mainly dairy and sheep. some farms offer bed and breakfast accommodation in the holiday periods and there is one registered camp site. On one farm, the wife has a pine furniture stripping service. There is a small quarry employing ten people. If children are unable to find work on their parents' farm,they obtain employment in Kilkhampton, Bude or Holsworthy- often only part time and frequently connected with the holiday industry.
